channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud App Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud App Management

item.title: CVE-2019-4750|2024-08-04T19:40:49.158Z -- ibm -- cloud%20app%20management
item.description: IBM Cloud App Management 2019.3.0 and 2019.4.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 173310.

item.title: CVE-2019-4751|2024-08-04T19:40:49.030Z -- ibm -- cloud%20app%20management
item.description: IBM Cloud App Management 2019.3.0 and 2019.4.0 reveals a stack trace on certain API requests which can allow an attacker further information about the implementation of the offering. IBM X-Force ID: 173311.
